item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded:
Features

  • Home
  • Features

Find the perfect ride for your journey with ease. Affordable rates, hassle-free booking, and top-quality carsready when you are.

Why choose us?

More than just a rental A better experience

01
Affordable Rates

Competitive pricing with no hidden fees.

02
Wide Availability

We are located in every major city in the country.

03
Premium Support

24/7 customer service for your peace of mind.

Your Journey, Your Ride!

Easy Booking Process
  • Online Reservations
  • Instant Confirmation
Wide Selection of Vehicles
  • Economy to Luxury Cars
  • Family & Group Rentals
Transparent Pricing
  • No Hidden Fees
  • Flexible Rental Packages
Easy Pickup & Drop-Off
  • Airport Services
  • Home Delivery
Customer-Friendly Policies
  • 24/7 Customer Support
  • Free Cancellation
Safety & Maintenance
  • Well-Maintained Vehicles
  • 24/7 Roadside Assistance
Save 20%

Weekend Getaway Deal

Save 20% on rentals from Friday to Monday!

Save 20%

Long Terms Discount

Save with special discounts on rentals over 7 days

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded:
About Us

  • Home
  • About

Find the perfect ride for your journey with ease. Affordable rates, hassle-free booking, and top-quality carsready when you are.

Our Company

At Swift, we believe that renting a car should be easy, affordable, and hassle-free. Whether youre planning a weekend getaway, a business trip, or a long-term rental, we provide top-quality vehicles and exceptional customer service to get you on the road with confidence.

Customer-Focused Service
Easy Online Booking
Our Services

15k

Happy Customers

First-Class Rides, Every Time!

Rent. Drive. Explore.

Drive Your Way Rent with Ease!

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded:
Pricing

  • Home
  • Pricing

Find the perfect ride for your journey with ease. Affordable rates, hassle-free booking, and top-quality carsready when you are.

Economy Cars

$49

/day

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing.

  • Fuel-efficient
  • Ideal for city drives
  • Models: Toyota Yaris, Honda Civic, Hyundai i10
Book Now
Family Cars

$79

/day

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing.

  • Spacious & comfortable
  • Great for road trips
  • Models: Toyota RAV4, Nissan X-Trail, Ford Explorer
Book Now
Luxury Cars

$129

/day

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing.

  • Top performance
  • Ideal for business trips
  • Models: BMW 5 Series, Mercedes-Benz E-Class, Audi A6
Book Now

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I book a car?

item.title: Form
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded:
<label for="mf-input-text-eea6284">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your Name`) } 					
				</label>
			<input type="text" id="mf-input-text-eea6284" 
				name="mf-listing-fname" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`John Doe`) } "
				onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
									aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-listing-fname'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el) }
							/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-listing-fname"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-email-79068eca">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Email`) } 					
				</label>
			<input 
				type="email" 
				defaultValue="" 
				class="mf-input " 
				id="mf-input-email-79068eca" 
				name="mf-email" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`john@doe.com`) } " 
				onBlur=${parent.handleChange} onFocus=${parent.handleChange} aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-email'] ? 'true' : 'false' } 
				ref=${el=> parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","emailMessage":"Please enter a valid Email address","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el)}
							/>
						<${validation.ErrorMessage} 
				errors=${validation.errors} 
				name="mf-email" 
				as=${html``}
			/>
							<label for="mf-input-telephone-3b9c9305">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Phone`) } 					
				</label>
			<input
				type="tel"
				class="mf-input "
				id="mf-input-telephone-3b9c9305" 
				name="mf-telephone"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`081 234 567 89`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-telephone'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el)}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-telephone"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-area-5f4c866d">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your Message`) } 					
				</label>
			<textarea id="mf-input-text-area-5f4c866d"
				name="mf-textarea" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your message here`) } "
				cols="30" rows="10"
									onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-textarea'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el)}
								></textarea>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-textarea"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<button type="submit" id="">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Send Message`) } 
				</button>

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded: Welcome to pagewist Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: pagewist
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
